algorithm_technique: Two pointers to overwrite duplicates in-place
problem_summary_simple: Remove duplicates from a sorted array in-place, keeping only unique elements.
problem_summary_technical: Modify a sorted array in-place using two pointers to maintain unique elements at the beginning.
key_insights: The array is sorted, which is crucial for the two-pointer approach.
The 'last' pointer tracks the position for the next unique element.
In-place modification means overwriting elements rather than creating a new array.
